metadata.title: ColorPops by First Impressions Molds Pearl Green 25 Edible Powder Food Color For Cake Decorating, Baking, and Gumpaste Flowers 10 gr/vol single jar
features: Great for cake decorating, making gum paste flowers, coloring buttercream frosting, fondant, and royal icing
Can be used with dry ingredients in recipes to color cake batter, macaroons, and more!
Applies smoothly and delivers vibrant color
Use with our Essentials cake decorating brushes for maximum pick up and smooth application!
Packaged in an easy open jar with an inner sealing lid to keep your color neat and protected. Nt. Wt. 10 gr/vol
description: With our 250 matte and 250 pearl colors, you can find the perfect shade! You'll also love the superior smoothness, brushability and coverage of our unparalleled line of powder food color - ColorPops! ColorPops has a range of 10 color families, including Red, Blue Yellow, Green, Brown, Purple, Pink, Flesh, Orange, and White/Natural/Black. Shades range from pastel to medium to super dark tones as well as flesh, gray, and three shades of black! Developed and manufactured in the USA by First Impressions Molds, LLC. Ingredients: Modified Cornstarch, Magnesium Stearate, Tapioca Starch, FD&C Blue 2 Lake, FD&C Yellow 5 Lake, Food Grade Pearlescent, Citric Acid (Preservative).
